summary: Reorganized AI Bot form layout: Moved phone number field to first row next to last name (order: name, last name, phone in first row). Reduced interests field width from 328px to 260px. Moved glass box 30px to the left by adding lg:left-[30px].
current_status: AI Bot form layout reorganized with phone number in first row, narrower interests field, and glass box shifted left. Ready for browser testing.
